name: Howdy Ranch Tower Defense
description:
Elevator Pitch

Single Player Tower Defense game with random draft mechanics similar to games of the auto-chess type. Mainly Mobile but with PC/Mac build.

Release Date: October 07 2022

Lore:

Old Buck doesn't care that the world is being invaded by aliens, but these @#! won't get into his farm!

Using what he knows of engineering, Old Buck managed to set up some defense mechanisms, or towers, to hold back the aliens from entering his farm.

Author:

My name is Forni, and I am an artist trying to learn how to code and make games in Unity. This is my first real game and I am trying something new: I will do all the Dev/Code and Game Design parts, while some of friends of mine are doing the artwork.
